mapper.insert: insert into combo_order (price, com_oder_date, start_date, combo_id, shootting_location_id, customer_id, shooting_state) values (#{price}, #{comOderDate}, #{startDate}, #{coId}, #{lid} , #{custId}, #{shootingState})
mapper.update: update combo_order set price = #{price}, com_oder_date = #{comOderDate}, start_date = #{startDate}, combo_id = #{combo.co_id}, customer_id = #{customer.cust_id}, shootting_location_id = #{shootingLocation.lid}, shooting_state = #{comboOrderState.os_id} where com_order_id = #{comOrderId}
update combo_order set shooting_state = #{osId} where com_order_id = #{comOrderId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM combo_order coo LEFT JOIN customer cu ON coo.customer_id = cu.cust_id LEFT JOIN combo cc ON coo.combo_id = cc.co_id LEFT JOIN shooting_location sl ON coo.shootting_location_id = sl.lid LEFT JOIN combo_order_state coss ON coo.shooting_state = coss.os_id where com_order_id = #{comOrderId}
